TEXT.TITLE: <CANADIAN UTILITIES LTD> TO REDEEM PREFERRED SERIES
TEXT.BODY: Canadian Utilities Ltd said it will redeem all its 14.5 pct cumulative redeemable second preferred shares series G on May 1, 1987. Redemption price is 26 dlrs per share, the company said. Reuter
